azurerm_data_lake_store_firewall_rule.description: Manages a Azure Data Lake Store Firewall Rule.

name.description: Specifies the name of the Data Lake Store. Changing this forces a new resource to be created. Has to be between 3 to 24 characters.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the Data Lake Store.

account_name.description: Specifies the name of the Data Lake Store for which the Firewall Rule should take effect.

start_ip_address.description: The Start IP address for the firewall rule.

end_ip_address.description: The End IP Address for the firewall rule.

id.description: The ID of the Data Lake Store Firewall Rule.

create.description: Used when creating the Data Lake Store Firewall Rule.

update.description: Used when updating the Data Lake Store Firewall Rule.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Data Lake Store Firewall Rule.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Data Lake Store Firewall Rule.
